name: Rush Hour (itch) (Whisker Games)
description:
Rush Hour is an endless runner where you make your way through rush hour!

Important Note

The game spawn different cars with random textures. There was a minor bug where this was not working and all cars had the default texture. This bug was fixed on 9/6/2021 during the voting period. The originally submitted version can still be downloaded for windows below, and the version where this minor bug was fixed can be played in browser above.

Controls

Up  or  W or Space - Jump

Down - Stomp

Stomp on cars for bonus points! You can also stomp on the ground to interrupt a jump!

Info

This is an entry to the Minijam 88

How this fits the limitation

The environment tells the story. Why are you even doing this madness in the first place?

Credits

SFX and some art assets by Kenney

Music:

Surf Inspector by Kevin MacLeod

Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4447-surf-inspector
